  • java.lang.Object

    Algorithm<ST,​PT>, Configurable
    public abstract class AbstractAlgorithm<ST,​PT>
extends Object
implements Algorithm<ST,​PT>
    Abstract implementation of Algorithm containing fields common to all algorithms
